wikitext.*:
'''Hísimë''', following [[Narquelië]] and preceding the last month, [[Ringarë]], is the eleventh month of the year according to the [[Kings' Reckoning|Kings']] and [[Stewards' Reckoning]] of [[Gondor]], and the eighth month according to the [[New Reckoning]]. Hísimë in the Kings' and Stewards' Reckoning corresponded to [[Blotmath]] in the [[Shire Calendar]] (approximately modern [[22 October]] through [[20 November]]).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>

Among the [[Dúnedain]] it was named in [[Sindarin]] ''[[Hithui]]''.
